Class AdjustSpeedMessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.host.logic.handler.AbstractHostMessageHandler<AdjustSpeedMessage>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageHandler<AdjustSpeedMessage>

    public class AdjustSpeedMessageHandler
extends AbstractHostMessageHandler<AdjustSpeedMessage>
    This handler handles a received AdjustSpeedMessage. This message can be received after authentication.
